title: Something in Firefox blocking WordPress admin functionality
content: Hi, I made the mistake of selecting a checkbox in a browser popup window that I thought was just asking me if I didn't want to be reminded about something everytime I tried to do it ... but it seems that's not the case, and unfortunately I cannot find the setting to reverse the decision, and it is stopping me from deleting wordpress plugins from the wordpress admin of my site ... when I now try to select the plugin "delete" link, it is unresponsive ... can you think of which thing I might have selected in what popup window of the browser, and how I could reverse this? I tried a few things but nothing worked.
creator: galacticpresident

title: Still Cannot Install Firefox
content:
First Reference this thread: â€‹From: Mozilla Support Forum <no-reply@support.mozilla.org> Date: Tue, Oct 26, 2021 at 5:54 AM Subject: FredMcD posted an answer to your question "Can not install Firefox"

Third. The above referenced email is well above my skill level. i think the essence of it is that I need to use the mentioned, best as I can tell, installers.

title: Hacked browser account
content: Hi, I've had a Firefox account taken over and removed as primary account holder. Can't seem to find anywhere to report this issue to Mozilla. Had to set up another account to ask this question. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks Graeme
creator: graemekal

title: verloren YouTube favorieten
content: halo ik heb kortgeleeden probleemen gehad met mijn pc gehad en ik heb al mijn favoriete YouTube verlorenen ik vind het niet meer terug en dat waren er heel veel die voor mij van groot belang waren en ik zau die graag terug willen ik hoop dat julie mij daar nij kunnen helpen ik heber een paar terug maar ik had er veel meer allesiens bedankt

title: Un-install Mozilla-Firefox from my laptop and iPhone, then re-install later.
content: I want to close my firefox account, delete and un-install the Mozilla-Firefow browser and App. then re-install the Firefox browser later. How do i do this? Thanks, I'm on a new MacBookPro laptop with the new M1 chip. Also an iPhone. Help!
creator: mdsj

title: printing 1/4 page using gmail after latest Firefox update.
content:
